bug_report.title: Missing images on some Glossary pages
bug_report.steps_to_reproduce: Navigate to website, Hover over the Education menu section, Click the Glossary of trading terms item The image srcset link has no space characters, as a result image is shown on the page The image srcset link has a space characters, as a result image is not shown on the page link some comments Yuriy Melnikov Oleg Ivanov
